sentences.en: I put aside my uneasiness and said, "We need to put the landing gear down now!"
sentences.cn: 我把不安放在一边，说：”我们现在需要放下起落架！“

sentences.en: The King was silent and thoughtful a while, and his face betrayed a growing distress and uneasiness.
sentences.cn: 国王沉默了一会儿，若有所思，他的脸上流露出越来越严重的痛苦和不安。

sentences.en: The whole assemblage was on its feet now, and well-nigh out of its mind with uneasiness, apprehension, and consuming excitement.
sentences.cn: 大家现在都站了起来，由于不安、焦急和极度兴奋，几乎都失去了理智。
